snippet: The Argentine rookie point guard Pablo Prigioni has been reluctant to shoot this season. Instead, he has focused on passing the ball, to get the proper ball movement on offense.
abstract: New York Knicks rookie point guard Pablo Prigioni has been reluctant to shoot, focusing instead on passing to get proper ball movement on offense; in Knicks win against Indiana Pacers, however, Prigioni had 8 points, 3 rebounds and 3 assists in the fourth quarter, even getting the crowd to chant his name.
lead_paragraph: The Argentine rookie point guard Pablo Prigioni has been reluctant to shoot this season. Instead, he has focused on passing the ball, to get the proper ball movement on offense.

headline.main: Decisive Surge Gets a Spark From Prigioni, of All People
headline.print_headline: Decisive Surge Gets a Spark From Prigioni, of All People
